title: "Nomidio Adopts Aculab’s Voice Biometrics Solution"
excerpt: "Nomidio has integrated Aculab’s VoiSentry voice recognition engine into its own cloud-based Identity-as-a-Service (IDaaS) platform. The partnership will allow Nomidio clients to verify the identities of their own customers with voice biometrics."
